results.title: A resolution designating the first week of April 2017 as "National Asbestos Awareness Week".
results.short_title: A resolution designating the first week of April 2017 as "National Asbestos Awareness Week".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the first week of April 2017 as National Asbestos Awareness Week. Urges the Surgeon General to warn and educate people about asbestos exposure, which may be hazardous to their health.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the first week of April 2017 as National Asbestos Awareness Week. Urges the Surgeon General to warn and educate people about asbestos exposure, which may be hazardous to their health.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2115)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S2000)
